meta_description: The Port Angeles Fine Arts Center is a gallery, arts center, and sculpture park all in one! As a non-profit, our mission is to honor the legacy of Esther Webster by connecting people to the arts. Our programming includes exhibitions, adult and youth workshops, outdoor festivals, community presentations, and more.

## Wintertide Festival of Lights 2025

This is an event you don't want to miss! Join us for our final festival of the year as we take to the woods in celebration.

### DATE AND TIME

Sat, December 13, 2025

# DETAILS

Saturday, December 13th | 4-8PM More event info at: pafac.org/programs/festivals/wintertide-festival/ Join us as we kick off a night of celebration with a community lantern walk- casting light throughout Webster's Woods and welcoming in an evening of merriment. Enjoy our glow in the dark art stations, shopping at our Makers Market in the gallery, and food and drinks by local vendors. The courtyard will be nice and cozy with warming stations for you to enjoy with friends and loved ones. You don't want to miss the mai...
collections_text:
## Festival of Lights

Purchase your tickets for our annual Wintertide Festival of Lights! Community lantern walks, light art installations, art & activity stations, food & drink vendors, live performances, and more are waiting for you on December 13th from 4PM-8PM.

[ Learn more ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251120043509/https://pafac.org/programs/festivals/wintertide-festival/)

## Buy Tickets & Support

In partnership with JFFA and North Olympic Discovery Marathon, we are able to offer prizes to three amazing local events. Purchase raffle tickets ($5/ticket) for a chance to win tickets to iLuminate, entry to the Jamestown Glow Run, or family access to Wintertide!

[ Learn More  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251120043509/https://givebutter.com/56YEsI)

## Visit the Gallery

The gallery is closed for exhibit turnover. Makers Market, an artisan market of local products, will open on November 28. Our outdoor Sculpture Park, Webster's Woods, will be transformed into the Light Art Experience as light art installations brighten its paths.

[ Learn More  ](/web/20251120043509/https://pafac.org/gallery-exhibits/)

## Take a Workshop

This Winter, we are offering an array of Lantern Workshops with partners on the Olympic Peninsula. Check out our offerings before the limited spots are booked.

[ Register for a Workshop ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251120043509/https://pafac.org/programs/workshops/)

[ Visit Us ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251120043509/https://paarts.wpengine.co...
